I have to say, this necklace is just as advertised. I also have to say, the size and shape of the heart is somewhat odd. I was expecting it to be slightly larger than a quarter and fairly round. I believe you could lay nearly 3 quarters atop it and it is fairly flat. The necklace, both the pendant and the cord, are pretty and seem to be good quality. This was purchased from a wish list and the intended recipient was not as forgiving of the difference between expectation and reality as I was. It is not the typical tween/teen jewelry you might expect. All that said, I will repeat that it IS just as advertised. I do not whole heatedly recommend the necklace, but if you read the description and really look at the photo and see that it is what you want, you should be happy with it. For the price I paid, I'm not going to return it, but it may become a decoration instead of a necklace.
